summary: This document is an electronic communication from the FBI requesting the assignment of a co-case agent for the investigation involving Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. It indicates the case is related to child prostitution and is classified as confidential.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary subject of the investigation related to child prostitution.

persons.name: Ghislaine N. Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine N. Maxwell is mentioned as a co-accused in the case involving Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Both individuals are implicated in the same case concerning child prostitution.

keyFacts: The document is a request for the assignment of a co-case agent for the Epstein investigation.
The case involves allegations of child prostitution.
The document is classified as confidential.
